description: Collaborated with development agency to re-design and re-build the Zero Motorcycles website from scratch. Created project timeline, held semiweekly dev stand-ups, and contributed in development. With 14 unique locales, a headless Shopify e-commerce site, model pages, dealer locator, and a variety of other new pages - we deployed the project within 6 months of start.

Built web forms and dealer locator for Zero website. Connected web, Meta & Google forms to HubSpot through Zapier. Created script in HubSpot to accurately route global lead submissions to closest dealer. Increased lead submissions by 34% and routing accuracy by 8%.
